{{cpp/regex/match_results/title|max_size}}
{{cpp/regex/match_results/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
size_type max_size() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the maximum number of submatches the {{tt|match_results}} type is able to hold due to system or library implementation limitations, i.e. {{c|std::distance(begin(), end())}} for the largest number of submatches.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Maximum number of submatches.

===Complexity===
Constant.
